message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $12000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm still very interested in the product, but I'd like to get a better deal.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value you're offering, and it's still within my budget.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'll offer the product to you for $10300. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm happy to make the deal.

I understand you're willing to make one final adjustment, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, as I mentioned in my previous offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.
